text: $1.5M in 24 hours on IndieGogo has to be a new record.
I was so excited by this one...  Totally awesome.  My wife and I are trying to decide if we are going to splurge and get one.
that 1.5m I think is only in 7 hours.   it went on sale at 4:00pm PST I thought.
All the early birds are gone already.
I have no clue yet how much shipping is from Australia.

We have built the Flow frame to accommodate a pneumatic system allowing for the possibility of automated harvest and remote harvest. The options are endless. Put a hive on your roof and pipe the honey right into your kitchen at the press of a button. This will be an available upgrade in the future.
